actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to clarify that prosecutors and other public officials acting in the performance of their official duties may enter into cooperation agreements and make other commitments, assurances, and promises, as provided by law in consideration of truthful testimony.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to provide that persons, when acting as provided by law for the proper discharge of official duties, may make offers or promises in exchange for testimony.

titles.title: A bill to clarify that prosecutors and other public officials acting in the performance of their official duties may enter into cooperation agreements and make other commitments, assurances, and promises, as provided by law in consideration of truthful testimony.
